data.message: You my dear shady need to go out onto the streets where battles began uve became far too dependant on technology and when ur out there in the street among random non famous ppl maybe you will find your sound again which I hope with all my being you do...... take time to reflect and remember what rapping and hip hop is really all about...... close your eyes lift your head to the sky's and just let what comes naturally resonate out your mouth only then will this world see the real king of hip hop and what his voice is truly capable of xxxxx lots of love and hugs

replies.message: Kill all the Muslims bomb their homes
